name: oaks-parcel
effect: A parcel to be delivered to Professor Oak for a Pokédex.
short_effect: Trade to Prof. Oak for a Pokédex.

flavor_text.emerald: A parcel for PROF. OAK from a POKéMON MART’s clerk.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A parcel to be delivered to PROF. OAK from VIRIDIAN CITY’s POKéMON MART.
